name: AWS Kinesis
description: Import AWS Kinesis Firehose delivery streams and Data Analytics applications for real-time data delivery and stream processing.
author: Dagster Community

outputs.description: Generates assets for each Kinesis entity

aws_access_key_id.label: Access Key ID
aws_access_key_id.description: AWS access key ID (optional if using IAM role)

aws_secret_access_key.label: Secret Access Key
aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS secret access key (optional if using IAM role)

aws_session_token.label: Session Token
aws_session_token.description: AWS session token for temporary credentials (optional)

import_firehose_streams.label: Import Firehose Streams
import_firehose_streams.description: Import Firehose delivery streams as materializable assets

import_analytics_applications.label: Import Analytics Applications
import_analytics_applications.description: Import Data Analytics applications as materializable assets

filter_by_tags.label: Filter by Tags
filter_by_tags.description: Comma-separated tag keys to filter entities

generate_sensor.label: Generate Observation Sensor
generate_sensor.description: Create sensor to observe delivery streams and analytics applications

group_name.label: Asset Group
group_name.description: Group name for all imported assets

description.label: Description
description.description: Description for the AWS Kinesis component
